device.longDescription: The EEP "A5-02-01" specifies a temperature sensor with a range between -40°C and 0°C.

parameter.label: Encryption
parameter.description: If set to "true" Homegear enforces encryption and discards unencrypted packets from the device.

parameter.label: Unreachable
parameter.description: Set to "true" when the device is unreachable.

parameter.label: Sticky unreachable
parameter.description: Set to "true" when the device is unreachable. It stays "true" until reset manually.

parameter.label: RSSI
parameter.description: The RSSI of the device in dBm.
